TopicTitle: Game creates new game on startup

Articles.Content:
Am I the only one with this issue where once the game loads it goes straight into a new game? (as in Day 1, 0h, 0m).

Playing with a few mods (mechjeb, kerbal alarm, for science, (outdated) chatterer).

Issue only cropped up with 1.2
Seems like I'm the only one with the issue. Will reinstall and see if that fixes it :S

Ok, this is really starting to bug me.

 

I have reinstalled the game (deleted local content) and reinstalled from steam, but the problem still persists.

Also, I am getting this "Debug" window that I cannot close, and don't really know what its for.

 

Mods have been updated, my game is now 1.2.1.

 

Tell me which files I need to post to get to the bottom of this.
